ai-tha-ap205:2.1_0: had an enemy to adorned with a golden statue,
ai-tha-ap205:2.3_0: joyful intent on what is beneficial,
ai-tha-ap205:2.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap205:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap205:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap205:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kimbila.
ai-tha-ap205:7.1_0: third part of the Elder Vediyaka
